name: Puppet Dancer
description:
Here is our submissison for default choice jam #1

One little problem... it's not a game. Not yet at least.

If you want to watch puppet dance, well, you can still download and play.

You can even kinda control the one in the middle, but there isn't any goal yet.

We intented to make a game where you have a little amount of time to reproduce the pose of the others puppet and then make a dance out of it. That part isn't done yet as you would have guessed.
